headline: What Recent Developments Mean For The Evolving Essex Property Trust ESS Investment Story
summary: Why the Essex Property Trust Price Target Just Shifted The small trim in fair value from US$282.31 to US$281.63, along with a slightly higher discount rate of 7.27% and a lower revenue growth assumption of 2.51%, reflects the mixed tone in recent research where some firms are more cautious on execution risks into 2026 while others still see room for apartment focused REITs to hold up relatively well. These tweaks capture both the supportive views tied to broader apartment and coastal...
